content.subject: 3 days until your Promise Farm tour!
content.body:
Your tour is just around the corner, and we can't wait to meet you!

As you prepare for your visit, here are a few things couples often tell us they appreciated most about Promise Farm:

üåø THE SETTING
There's something magical about standing on our ceremony lawn, feeling the breeze, and looking out at the rolling Lancaster County hills. It's the kind of moment that makes you say 'this is it.'

üèõÔ∏è THE BARN
Our restored barn strikes that perfect balance - rustic enough to feel authentic, elegant enough to feel special. Those chandeliers!

üí° THE FLEXIBILITY
Every wedding here is unique because we let YOU make the choices. Your caterer, your style, your way.

üí∞ THE VALUE
Couples are consistently surprised (in a good way!) by our pricing. Beautiful weddings don't have to drain your savings.

We recommend arriving about 5 minutes early so we can start right on time. And don't worry about the weather - if it's raining, we'll adjust the tour route and show you how cozy the indoor spaces are!

See you soon!
